lore: After Taylor created the Whiptail Clutcher, he decided that the Torture Chamber needed guards that could hurt and kill the convicts when he was busy hurting and killing people in his castle.\n\nA Doomguard's armor is part of its body. For the Death Guard, Taylor went to a lot of effort to create an armor with no openings, imbued with extraordinary magical powers that it could share with its allies.
menagerieDialog: Huff...\n\n(Why does it look so tired?)
(It's continuously slamming its shield into the ground. How obnoxious.)
(Its breathing is slow and hoarse, and it doesn't seem to be looking at anything in particular. Creepy.)
(It's attempting to sweep the floor with its shield. Thanks!)
(It's scraping a gauntleted finger over its shield to make a horrible screeching noise.)
name: Death Guard
